classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 and Claude to create interactive features and autonomous tools. It also stresses the development of production-grade user-facing applications by integrating AI across front-end and back-end systems, which aligns perfectly with the definition of a GenAI Engineer.
